title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deep Dive: ECS Managed Instances & Blue/Green for Resilient Services (CNS416)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入探讨：ECS 托管实例和蓝/绿部署以实现弹性服务 (CNS416)
abstract: Dive deep into Amazon ECS Managed Instances, a new compute paradigm for container workloads, and learn how to leverage it alongside sophisticated Blue/Green deployment strategies. This session explores architectural patterns, best practices, and real-world examples of building resilient services. We share how resilience principles shaped one of AWS's core orchestration services and why this matters for your container strategy. We'll examine advanced deployment techniques, automatic rollbacks, and maintaining zero-downtime during updates. Essential knowledge for architects and developers building production-grade containerized applications at scale.
abstract_cn: 深入探讨 Amazon ECS 托管实例，这是一种用于容器工作负载的新计算范式，并学习如何将其与复杂的蓝/绿部署策略结合使用。本次会议探讨架构模式、最佳实践以及构建弹性服务的实际案例。我们分享弹性原则如何塑造 AWS 的核心编排服务之一，以及为什么这对您的容器策略很重要。我们将研究高级部署技术、自动回滚以及在更新期间保持零停机时间。这是为构建生产级大规模容器化应用程序的架构师和开发人员提供的必备知识。
